characters.name: Rin Matsuoka
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm (5'10"); 179 cm (5'10")
__Swim Style:__ Butterfly (specialty), breaststroke, individual medley

The rival swimmer from Sametsuka Academy.  Rin Matsuoka is Haruka's rival who is also in 11th grade. He had gone abroad to study swimming, but his personality changed immensely by the time he had returned to Japan and for this reason he often perplexes his former teammates.  Rin goes to all-boys school.

characters.name: Nagisa Hazuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm (5'5"); 167 cm (5'6")
__Swim Style:__ Breastroke (Specialty)

Breaststroke swimmer of the Iwatobi High School swimming team. Haruka's kouhai and a first year. He is a straight-forward person and his actions are faster than his words. He admires Haruka's swimming; it's the reason for him to start swimming. He enters Iwatobi High School because Haruka is there.

characters.name: Haruka Nanase
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm (5'9"); 177 cm (5'10")
__Swim Style:__ Freestyle

Freestyle swimmer (crawl) of the Iwatobi High School swimming team. Haruka Nanase is an 11th grader who loves to swim. His strong and quiet swimming style fascinates many, and he holds a strong fixation on freestyle swimming.  His best friends include Makoto Tachibana & Nagisa Hazuki from Grade School, then he later befriends Rei Ryugazaki. He used to be best friends with Rin Matsuoka, but now Rin has become Haruka's rival. Haruka has created the Iwatobi High School Swimming Club along with his other friends to take down Rin.

characters.name: Rei Ryuugazaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm (5'10")
__Swimming style__: Butterfly stroke

A freshman who joins the Iwatobi High School swim team.  Rei Ryuugazaki is a classmate of Nagisa's in 10th grade. He was originally a member of the track team, but decided to join the swimming club instead. A handsome, intelligent young man who often gets manipulated by Rin for some reason.

(Source: ANN)

characters.name: Makoto Tachibana
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm (6'0")  

Backstroke swimmer of the Iwatobi High School swimming team.  Makoto Tachibana is Haruka's inseparable best friend since 11th grade. He understands Haruka's good points, and is often forced to speak as his spokesman. He is very kind and considerate, but is also very easily scared and weak-hearted.  

(Source: AnimeNewsNetwork)

characters.name: Gou Matsuoka
characters.description: Rin’s little sister. She's Hazuki's classmate and 1st-year in Iwatobi high school. She has a refreshing personality in school but is always worried about her brother, Rin.

characters.name: Miho Amakata
characters.description: Haruka and Makoto's homeroom teacher and classic literature teacher. She seems to have been an office lady in Tokyo in the past, but no one knows the details. She utters the words of great figures from ages past. Due to her personality, when she asks something of someone, they can't refuse.  (Source: ANN)

characters.name: Seijuurou Mikoshiba
characters.description: The captain of the swim team at Sametsuka Academy.

characters.name: Aiichirou Nitori
characters.description: A member of the swim team at Samezuka Academy. He is a first year and Rin's roommate.
